value.title: Study: MRI with machine learning reveals brain changes from PTSD

value.title: AI Machine Learning Breakthrough Is a Twist on Brain Replay
value.excerpt: From a neuroscience perspective, the concept of brain replay is analogous to a streaming service that activates repeat showings from its vast archives of stored pre-recorded content. The brain can replay memories by reactivating the neural activity patterns that represent prior experiences whether asleep or awake.
